holidays.title: Juneteenth
holidays.description: The freedom of African Americans from slavery in the U.S. in 1865 is celebrated.

holidays.title: National Martini Day
holidays.description: Do you prefer it dry, dirty, shaken, or not stirred?

holidays.title: National Take Your Cat to Work Day
holidays.description: We show our cats the world on the other side of the window.

holidays.title: Artigas Birthday
holidays.description: Honor the sacrifices of José Gervasio Artigas and uphold his contributions to Uruguay on Artigas’ Birthday.

holidays.title: International Box Day
holidays.description: If you don’t have a cat, you may not get what all the fuss is about.

holidays.title: International Day for the Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict
holidays.description: Let's join hands and come together to put an end to these appalling crimes against women.

holidays.title: National FreeBSD Day
holidays.description: Buckle-up! We are about to deep dive deep and look into everything FreeBSD!

holidays.title: National Garfield the Cat Day
holidays.description: He’s witty, he’s sassy, he’s blunt, he’s saucy…he’s, well, Garfield.

holidays.title: National Watch Day
holidays.description: Can you imagine a world without watches? We can’t either!

holidays.title: Sacred Heart
holidays.description: It’s all about the greatest love we’ve ever known this holiday, the love of Jesus Christ.

holidays.title: World Sauntering Day
holidays.description: This World Sauntering Day, head out for a stroll and enjoy the beauty of nature.

holidays.title: World Sickle Cell Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s time to shine the light on sickle cell disease and spread awareness.

holidays.title: Symonne Harrison’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a multi-talented performer, model, and content creator who has a positive impact on her audience.

holidays.title: Tommie Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's a fantastic reality television star who never fails to put on a show.
